inn1.comm: short ball and cut hard into the ground behind point.
a sharp bouncer and off the glove to Taibu behind the wicket, a loud appeal for a catch, turned down, that was close.
good length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
drives and misses outside the off stump.
good delivery angled across, left alone by Tamim.
short and pulled around to square leg, well fielded there.
defended to the onside.
length delivery outside the off stump and Siddique drives on the up but there is no timing, goes in the air to Matsikenyeri at cover, who gobbles up an easy catch.
good length delivery defended to point.
turned to square leg.
left alone outside the off stump.
another good leave outside the off stump.
lovely shot and Tamim drives on the up through extra cover and the ball races along the turf to the fence.
drives uppishly to the left of third man to pick up a single.
short delivery outside the off stump and Ashraful shoulders arms.
keeps a bit low, the ball comes in and Ashraful plays and misses, through to Taibu.
defended to the onside beside the track.
good length delivery and Ashraful defends to mid-off.
moves forward and drives with a straight bat to mid-off.
pushes to mid-on.

Chigumbura picks up a second, Tamim looking to drive through the off side, the ball moves away and with it takes the edge to Taibu behind the wicket to his left. Bangladesh in a spot of bother at 5 for 2.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
drives on the up and goes in the air through point to the deep, playing to early.
left alone outside the off stump.
short delivery and moving away outside the off stump, Taibu quickly moves to his right and does well.
yorker dug out back past the bowler to mid-on.
low full toss and Ashraful not in a good position, plays to mid-off and takes off for a tight single.
short delivery outside the off stump, left alone through to Taibu.
not much bounce this time, it was a short delivery and Raqibul looking to leave the ball, misjudges the bounce and takes it on his chest.
left alone through to Taibu.
back of a length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
short and bit wide outside the off stump, Ashraful watchful, lets it go.
back of a length delivery coming into Ashraful, drops it softly to midwicket for a quick single.
short delivery and Raqibul watching it closely ducks under the ball, it was bit wide though.
back of a length delivery and coming in, that was a good leave by Raqibul.
good length delivery defended to extra cover.
short and wide outside the off stump, cut in the air to third man.
a bouncer and that is one for the over, watches it well and sways from the line of the delivery.
short outside the off stump, left alone once again.
defended to the onside.
quick and short from Jarvis coming in, Raqibul looking to run it down, misses it.
moves back and defends with an angled bat to backward point.
drops it softly in the direction of backward point and takes off for a single, no response from the non-striker and Ashraful has to dive back into the crease as the throw comes in.
inside edges down to fine leg, that was a good delivery, coming in.
defended back to the bowler.
bouncer down the leg side and Ashraful does well to let it go.
off the pad and behind the wicket on the onside.
defended with a straight bat to the onside beside the track.
bouncer and Ashraful gets out of the line of the delivery.
down the track comes Ashraful and cuts hard in the air and the third man trying to take the catch, goes over him and over the fence for maximum.
off the pad to the onside as he was looking to work it.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
short delivery and Ashraful gets behind it and defends to the off side.
good length delivery and Ashraful defends with an angled bat to point.
full delivery hit into the ground and over the bowler to mid-off.
left alone outside the off stump.
pushes to midwicket for a single.
once again comes down the track and Ashraful is cramped to play any shot, he can only guide it down to the slip fielder.
good tight delivery on the off stump and Ashraful defends to mid-off.
fuller delivery pushed to mid-on.
short ball guided with a horizontal bat to backward point.
back of a length delivery and Raqibul defends with an angled bat to point.
good short delivery and Raqibul looking to defend, gets high on the bat and ball lobs up on the off side but away from the fielders.
outside edge down to third man, extra bounce once again.
down the wicket and looking to hit through the off side, mistimes it back to the bowler.
short and wide outside the off stump, too high for Ashraful to attempt any shot, left alone through to Taibu.
width outside the off stump and cut hard into the ground to backward point, that should have been put away, the ball coming slowly off the track.
cuts on the front foot to cover, fails to find a gap.
edges over the slip and down to third man fence, the fielder was a bit late for the catch.
short delivery and Raqibul looking to defend, gets an inside edge on the track.
lovely delivery short of a length and moving away slightly outside the off stump, Raqibul looking to defend, beats the outside edge to Taibu behind the wicket.
edges in the air down to third man, Raqibul wanting the second takes off but then sees Ashraful standing his ground, he retrieves back into the crease.
plays to the onside.
drives to mid-on and takes off for a tight single, Raqibul dives into the crease as the throw comes in.
defended to the off side.
short outside the off stump and left alone.
too wide outside the off stump and signalled a wide by the umpire.
blocked back to the bowler.
bouncer and was very high, another wide signalled.
driven nicely on the up and over extra cover to the fence, that was a wonderful strike from Ashraful.
short ball and an inside edge onto the body and to the off side.
pushes along the ground to cover.
short ball worked square of the wicket on the onside.
short ball cut to deep point for a single.
short outside the off stump and left alone.
length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
played softly behind the wicket and they take off for a quick single.
short of a length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful shoulders arms.
lovely shot from Ashraful, there was width and he cuts behind point past the fielder to the fence, wonderful timing.
a deft touch down to third man for a single.
short of a length delivery and plays with an angled bat down to third man.
Ashraful falls, looking for the big booming drive through the off side, there was width and he edges it through to Taibu, Chigumbura is excited, picks up his third wicket.
plays it through backward point and down to third man for a single.
pushes to mid-on and gets off the mark, Utseya goes with one hand but fails to field the ball.
driven to mid-on.
driven well along the ground to cover but cannot find the gap.
drives to mid-on.
chopped into the ground behind point.
good line from Jarvis on the stumps and defended back to him.
short ball cut in the air in the gap behind point to the deep.
back of a length delivery angled down the leg side and Shakib fails to connect as he was looking to swing it over the ropes on the onside.
a low juicy full toss and Shakib plays it with ease through midwicket and to the fence.
short ball and Shakib looking for the pull, gets some glove as the ball rolls along to the onside.
blocked to the onside, extra bounce.
good length delivery outside the off stump, Shakib just leans back and lofts it across the line to the wide long-on fence. Good clean hit

short of a good length and outside the off stump, once gain Shakib goes across the line but this time the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls away straight to the fielder at short midwicket
much better line - fuller and close to the off stump line, Shakib clips it away of the back-foot to the man at midwicket
slower delivery, Shakib picks it up late but manages to safely play it down to mid-off
played wide of the fielder at midwicket, easy single
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Raqibul stays back and clips it down to fine leg. Easy single to end the over
flat delivery outside the off stump, defended
outside the off stump and turning in, Raqibul stays back and works it away on the leg side

suicide! tossed up delivery, Raqibul works it away behind square on the leg side and calls for the single, Shakib takes a couple of steps and then changes his mind but its too late for Raqibul as Chigumbura's throw comes in at the striker's end and Taibu clips the bails with Raqibul out by a long way
driven down to long-on, off the mark straightaway
played back to the bowler
cut away well wide of the fielder at cover

Shakib too departs! good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing there. Shakib drives well away from his body and ends up with a faint edge -  was a nothing shot and Taibu does the rest. Bangladesh 5 down and in deep trouble here.
off the mark in style! full and on the middle and off stump line, Mahmudullah leans forward and clips it away through midwicket. Lovely shot

That's the end of that! Bangladesh in total disarray here! back of a length and close to the off stump line, came in with the angle. Mahmudullah looks to work it away on the leg side but fails miserably and the edge goes straight to Price at first slip. Four more to go
left alone outside the off stump, that's better.
fuller length delivery, defended watchfully
drifting down the leg side and that's played down to fine leg for a single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the man at cover
quicker delivery, played away on the off side
tossed up outside the off stump, defended leaning forward
sharp turn and Islam gets hit on the pad - looking to defended
defended stretching well forward
fuller length delivery, Islam looks to flick it away and the ball rolls away off the inside edge
left alone outside the off stump.
fuller delivery and Rahim looking to drive down the ground, mistimes to the onside.
defended to the off side.
back of a length delivery and Rahim plays with an angled bat and down to third man.
keeps low from back of a length and he plays and misses.
turned forward of square leg.
waits for the turn and cuts hard but fails to find the gap.
defended down the track.
moves back and punches to extra cover.
this time he finds the gap, a touch short and Rahim cuts hard behind point and the ball races to the fence in quick time.
played to the off side.
plays it late down to third man.
moves forward and pushes behind point.
punches hard behind point.
short delivery and Naeem gets on top off it and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
cut in the air to third man.
on the middle and leg, played to midwicket.
fuller delivery driven through extra cover to the sweeper for a single.
sweeps through square leg to the deep.
driven down the ground to long off.
defended on the front foot to cover.
swept well this time, finds the gap in front of square leg to the fence.
comes forward and plays behind point.
moves back and chops it into the ground to deep backward point.
drives well to the left of mid-on, Chigumbura does well diving to his left and saves a certain boundary.
back of a length delivery and coming in, Rahim plays on the back foot and gets beaten.
plays a delicate cut over the slip and down to third man fence.
fuller delivery driven to mid-on.
plays from the crease and runs it down to third man for a single.
good length delivery defended to cover.
short ball pulled to deep square leg.
comes forward and defends to cover.
goes all the way, outside the off stump and Naeem swings it high and over the square leg fence for maximum.
flat delivery and off the pad to the onside.
tossed up bit fuller on the off stump, driven down the ground to long off.
moves back and turns it to square leg for a single.
tossed up outside the leg stump and off the pad behind the wicket on the onside.
comes forward and pushes to cover.
on the off and middle, spins and across, defended to cover.
comes forward and drives down the ground to long off.
on the middle and leg, Naeem comes forward and defends to the off side.
tossed up bit fuller outside the off stump, driven hard along the ground but straight to extra cover.
well flighted delivery and Rahim defends down the track.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long off.
defended to the off side.
pushes to mid-on.
off the pad as he looks to sweep, down to short fine leg.
moves back and the ball skews off the outside edge and behind point.
off the bat and pad to the off side.
comes forward and drives to mid-off.
swept behind square leg to the deep.
plays square of the wicket on the off side for a single.
edges behind square leg for a single.
down the track and driven to long on, brings up the 100 for Bangladesh.
down the wicket and drives to long off for a single.
defended down the track.
played to the off side.
opens the face off the bat and the ball goes down to third man, excellent save by Taylor.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
sweeps and he misses, takes it on the pad outside the line of the stumps.
works square of the wicket on the onside.
sweeps behind square leg to the deep, a mistimed shot.
played behind square leg.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
defended down the track.
works it behind square leg.
worked to the onside, fielder in quickly prevents the single.
defended solidly to the off side.
defended down the track.
moves back and works it through square leg for a single.
blocked to the off side to cover.
swings it from outside the off stump to deep midwicket for a single.
mistimes the drive back to the bowler.
pulls it behind square leg to the deep.
tossed up outside the leg stump and swept along the ground to deep square leg.
played to cover and takes off for a tight single, the throw strikes the stumps, referred to the third umpire, green light flashes as Rahim dived back in time.
well flighted delivery and driven past the bowler to long off, that brings up the 50 partnership for the 7th wicket.
swept to deep backward square leg for a single.
flat delivery and forces off the back foot to extra cover.
down the leg side, sweeps and gets some glove to it and down to fine leg.
outside edge and to the left of short third man.
comes forward and plays to point.
played behind the wicket on the onside, the non-striker takes off and the throw comes to the bowlers end, nobody backing up and they get an overthrow.
sweeps and gets a top edge, the ball flies to deep backward square leg and Coventry takes the catch.
cut to the sweeper cover for a single.
comes forward and defends back to the bowler.
worked through midwicket to the deep.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
a lovely googly, plays and misses.
pushes to the off side, Cremer quickly moves to his right and saves a run.
defended to the off side.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
sweeps well forward of square leg to the deep.
swings it down the ground to long on.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side for a single.
swings and misses, Taibu appeals for something, not sure for what, the square leg umpire is unmoved.
short ball pulled to deep midwicket.
chips it through midwicket to the deep.
sweeps in the air to deep backward square leg.
googly, swings and misses.
works it behind square leg for a single.

tossed up delivery and Razzaq swings it high in the air, a miscued shot outside the circle at midwicket, Utseya judges it well and takes a good catch, he then runs forward and then seems to just fall down on the ground, he seems to have hurt his ankle.
defended to the off side.
pushed to mid-on for a single.
worked to the onside.
flat delivery and pulled to short fine leg.
moves back and works forward of square leg.
down the track and drives down the ground to long on.
driven to long on.
comes forward and defends with an angled bat to point.
swings and off the pad and down to third man.
swings and gets a top edge to the left of short third away from the fielder.
cut to the sweeper cover for a single.
played back to the bowler.
swept to deep backward square leg.
turns it behind square leg.
pushes to cover.
plays it back to the bowler.
short ball and hit in the air and in the gap to midwicket fence, a long hop well put away.
pushed to the off side.
swept in the air to deep square leg.
comes forward and plays to extra cover.
swings and misses, taken on the thigh.
flatter from Cremer, pushed to the off side.
outside edge to short third man.
good ball coming into Rahim, plays to the off side.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man for a single.
squares him up and gets a leading edge to the off side to cover.
what a shot! stamp of authority from Dolar, cuts hard in the gap through extra cover to the fence.
short ball and Dolar is on fire, hooks it well over midwicket fence for maximum, lovely strike.
short ball and Dolar once again does well, pulls it over the midwicket fielder to the fence.
down the track to the pitch off the ball and drives to long on.
driven down the ground to long on.
works it through square leg for a single.
lovely strike once again, this time Dolar picks it up and launches it over the fielder at long on for maximum.
and again Dolar picks up the length and launches it over the midwicket fence for another maximum, this is great striking.
defends to the off side, an anticlimax.
reverse sweep but there is no timing, played to short third man.
dabs it behind point for a single.
works it to midwicket for a single.
moves back and cuts to the sweeper for a single.
defends with an angled bat to point for a single, played with soft hands.
worked to the onside.
full toss, swings it high in the air to midwicket fence.
right up in the block-hole, off the toe and behind the wicket.
another wonderful delivery in the block-hole, squeezed out behind the wicket on the off side.
short slower delivery and Rahim was already into the pull shot, he then finally drags it to the onside.
full delivery on the legs, whips it along the ground to backward square leg to Cremer.
full delivery driven down the ground to long on.
full toss and Dolar swings once again but this time miscues it high in the air and Masakadza takes the catch at extra cover.
lovely shot from Rahim, waits for the ball and hits it hard in the gap through cover to the fence, brings up his 50, well played.
another wonderful strike from Rahim, picks it up and lofts it high over the bowler to the fence. It was in the slot for Rahim.
swings and misses, a dot ball.
moves across and takes it on the full and looking to play it fine past the keeper but scoops it to the left of Taibu, who moves quickly to take the catch.

inn2.comm: short in length and moving away from the off stump, left alone. Free hit coming up.
big swing and a miss. It was a full delivery, shaping away late from the off stump, Masakadza had big wild swing to the on side but no wood on leather
back of length, landing around off stump and moving away, Masakadza respects that movement and shoulders arms
gets closer to the line of short of length delivery and cuts straight to backward point. So far Dollar has been operating short of length, barring that Freehit delivery
fuller this time, on the middle and leg, curving in and since there is that outswing, Masakadza defends carefully rather than trying to flick it across the line .. pushes it gently to the on side
short in length again, moving away from the off stump, cut crisply but straight to backward point. Chance for a boundary missed
on the middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on and they scamper across
fullish, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
short in length, outside off, punched away to backward point
lovely flick. It was on the middle and leg allright but he maintained his balance well as he leaned forward and flicked past square-leg. Just timing, no violence
good delivery, bouncing in to the rib cage, fended away to the on side but he has overstepped the line. Free hit coming up
Whack. Banged in short and Chibhaba swivelled back to play a crunchy pull over backward square-leg boundary.
fuller, outside off, almost lands past the forward crese, swings away and the batsman tries to jam it away but can't connect
around the off stump, moving away, guided down to third man
Imperious. Top shot. It was short in length around the off stump, Chibhaba, who played a lovely pull for a six in the previous over, pulls this one over midwicket. Neatly done.
and finally, Dollar bowls it fuller, around the off stump, moves away, defended to the bowler. There is some early movement on offer here
short in length again, just outside off, punched straight to backward point. He could have got some runs had he placed it well
goes for the pull again but drags it down to fine leg
back of length outside off stump, tries to punch on the up but it falls short of the short cover fielder (Shakib Al Hasan)
fuller, around 123 kmph, on the off stump line, the batsman leans forward to defend
short in length outside off stump, punched sweetly to point. Both batsmen have played that shot a few times but have not got the placement right till now
drifts to the pads, clipped to square-leg where Raqibul goes to his right to make a diving stop
length delivery on the off stump, straightening, pushed out to the off side
banged in short outside off stump line, swayed away
fuller, moves  away late and Chibhaba shapes to square drive but adjusts to the outswinger by taking the bottom-hand off the handle and the ball shoots to backward point
slightly short in length outsdie off and carved away off the outer edge to third man
loopy delivery on the off and middle, lures the batsman forward and he pushes hard at it; the ball flies off the edge past the slip and down to third man boundary
the arm-ball, hits the pad in front of leg and would have gone down leg side. shout for lbw ...
leans forward to defend to the off side

risky strike. He tries to break free of the shackles by going for the big shot; he charged down the track but was beaten in the flight and then by the turn and the intended hit over mid-off went over covers
on the middle stump, turns to get the edge and goes to covers
on the middle and off line, stabbed away on the front foot. Fine over.
short in length outside off, sliced away to third man
this one moves in with the angle on the middle stump line, tapped close on the on side and they rush across
slower one but picked up early and the length- very short and outside off - allowed Masakadza to wait and punch it away through extra cover
short in length, tries to punch it on the up but doesn't quite time it well and finds point
banged in short outside off, left alone
short in length outside off stump line, edges the punchy stroke to behind the wicket
turns away from the off stump, punched off the back foot to covers
nice delivery, drifted in towards off and middle before spinning away , the batsman pushed inside the line
gets forward to defend to the on side
slower, on the off stump line, gets on the front foot to tap it gently
quicker, the arm ball, hits the pad but again, moving down the leg side
another one that comes in with the arm, strikes the pad but is hit outside off stump line
down the leg side, goes past the attempted glance and escapes from the keeper as well

dead plumb in front. It was the armer, drifting in the on the middle stump line, Chibhaba, who was struggling against spin, leaned forward to defend but pushed outside the line, perhaps expecting the ball to turn away. Mistake. The ball hit him right in front of the middle. Gone!

Another easy decision to make for Nadir Shah. Another arm ball. It landed just outside off stump and moved in. Taylor moved forward rather hesitantly unsure whether its going to turn away or come in. The ball moved in past the poke and hit him in front. It would have hit leg and middle or at least the leg stump.
On a hattrick and what does Taibu try to do? he attempts to play the sweep but sees the ball turning away from him and adjusts to defend
he does it again! he shapes to sweep but adjusts to push it away to the off side .

What is going on out there?! Comical stuff from Taibu. Again he shapes to sweep way ahead before the delivery is bowled; the ball drops short and turns away from the off stump. Taibu, already on a bent knee, tries to adjust and tries to swat it to the on side but only drags it back to his stumps. Three wickets in this over. Zimbabwe struggling here after quite a decent start
floated well outside off stump, padded away
slip and short leg in and this one has been turned away to wrist it behind square-leg for a single
slows up the pae, tosses it outside off, pushed out to covers
arm ball on the middle stump line, stabbed off the inner edge just past the diving short leg
leans forward to defend to the off side
the quicker one, coming in, punched out the on side
turns away from the off stump, goes off the open bat-face but falls short of the slip
just outside off stump, pushed out to point
flighted on the middle stump line, defended back down the track
goes right back to punch it to extra cover
drops it short and punched away to long-off. Why long-off? Why not mid-off to the new batsman?
just outside off, goes for the cut but is beaten by the lack of pace there
on the middle stump line, Masa takes care not the get the front leg in the way as he leans forward to defend
They were struggling against turn and welcome the mediumpace stuff with a firm flick through midwicket. It was full and angling to the legs
on the off stump line, defended out to covers. 141 to win from 39.4 overs

huge shout for the catch behind the wicket but Aleem Dar is not interested. It was a back-of-length delivery that straightened outside off stump, the batsman tries to stab it away. There was some noise, don't know whether it was bat on ball.
outside off stump, left alone
banged in short and stays outside off, left alone
high harmless bouncer and yep, its a wide

Dropped by Raqibul at first slip. Not a easy chance but not very difficult either. It was short of length delivery, tries to punch it on the up and away from the body. The ball flew between the keeper and Raqibul who lunged to his side but couldn't hold on
shout for lbw but going down the leg side. Masakadza moves forward and again plays down the wrong line
chips down the track but the ball is dropped shorter in length and it turns in to hit the pad
on the middle and leg, whipped behind square-leg
flighted on the stumps, heaved away past square-leg
fuller, on the middle and leg, hit towards the non-striker and the bowler lunges to his side to stop it
very short delivery outside off, hit straight to short extra cover
length delivery on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
And again. Masakadza is carefully forward, pushing it out to the off side
130. 8 kmph low full toss, mistimed towards midwicket .. bit of movement in

Four down and a stunner to remove Masakadza. It was short and slightly wide, Masakadza gave it the full treatment and it flew to the left of backward point where Raqibul pulled of a very fine reflex catch. Masakadza looks stunned and he should be. That was a sharp catch
short in length and outside off, punched away to backward point. Overthrows at the non-striker's end
lifting delivery outside off stump, 131.8 kmph, left alone
Thrash. Superb hit. He backed away and sliced the full delivery over the cover boundary. Lovely whiplash swing of the bat and the white ball flew up and over into the crowd
on the middle stump line, edged away behind square-leg
goes right back to work it past square-leg
moves down the track to push it to mid-off
leans forward to defend to the off side
on the middle, goes on straight, on the back foot, deflected to midwicket
again, moving in with the arm, tapped to the on side
length delivery just outside off stump, steered to point
short in length outside off, cut away to right of wide third man where Ashraful mops up
lifting delivery on the off stump line, Coventry gets on top of the bounce to defend it to the off side
Ouch. The bouncer, well-directed, rears up at Coventry who takes his eyes off the ball and hops up. The ball crashes into the left shoulder and flies to slip
back of length outside off stump, punched sweetly to cover
short and wide, goes for the upper cut but doesn't connect
slow through the air, on the middle and leg, defended to the on side
slighlty short, a tad quicker, cut down to backward point
on the middle and leg, runs off the inner half of the bat to the on side
full outside off stump, creamed through extra cover
arm-ball, on the leg stump line and again missing the leg stump.
just outside off, straightens, punched down to long-off
stays back to push this flat-trajectory delivery back to the bowler
just outside off, punched off the back foot to mid-off region for a single
short in length around off stump, fisted down to long-on
spins down the leg side .. wide
fetches the off break from the off stump line and paddles it away for a single
slows up the pace, tosses it full outside off, driven down to long-off
tad quicker, just outside off, pushed out to cover
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
on the middle stump line, stabbed to the on side
just short of length, punched away but can't beat short extra cover
goes right back to push this one back to the bowler
leans forward, takes care not the press that front leg across to avoid lbw, and defends
again pushes that front leg straight down the track as he defends.
short in length, on the leg and middle, the batsman shuffles inside the line to dab it to fine-leg region
short in length, on the off stump line, pushed out to the off side
the bouncer on the middle, doesn't quite keep his eyes on the ball till the last moment but goes through with the pull to deep square-leg
moves down the leg side .. Aleem Dar extends his arms
full in length, moves in towards the off and middle line, defended compactly on the front foot
length delivery outside off stump, nudged to short cover
fuller, outside off, square driven but straight to backward point
flighted ever so slowly on the middle, Coventry is early into his drive and edges it to right of midwicket
quicker, just short of length, cut to point
on the leg stump line, rolls off the pad to the on side .. they think about a single but Rahim, the keeper, is very quick
drops this short of length , cut down to deep point
outside leg stump, nudged behind square-leg for a single
really full outside off stump, tries to square drive but the ball squeezes under the bat and Rahim does well to collect that
stunning hit. Classy. It was a length delivery outside off, Coventry bent his knees to give him balance and power and punched it on the up to left of mid-off.
shorter, outside off, opens the bat-face to run it down to third man
on the middle and leg, full, turned towards deep backward square-leg region
short in length, around the off stump, stays adjacent to the line and chops it down to third man
full in length, in the zone outside off stump, left alone

Important breakthrough achieved. It was the short delivery outside off, Coventry tried to fetch it from there as he went for the pull but didn't connect well and it lobbed up. Razzak ran in from deep midwicket and caught it on the rebound.

Neat little straight drive. It was tossed up on the middle stump line, Chigumbura leaned forward to drive it straight past the non-striker. Tamim made a valiant effort near the boundary robes but couldn't prevent it from going over
leans forward to push it to cover
quicker arm ball, rolls off the pad for a run
on the middle and leg, tickled to square-leg
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
drops it slightly short and Chigumbura unfurls a crunchy pull shot
moves in towards the middle stump line, stabbed away
take that! slightly short and wide outside the off stump, Matsikenyeri just leans back and cuts it past the fielder at backward point, comfortably beats the man in the deep as well
cut away off the back-foot, easy single
bit of width offered outside the off stump and Chigumbura gets it wide of the fielder at cover
short ball, angled into middle and leg, Matsikenyeri moves back and across and works it down to fine leg for a single
left through to the keeper
pitched up and drifting down the leg side, diving half stop from the keeper saves four runs
off-cutter, runs it away behind point
easy runs! fulltoss on the pads and Chigumbura clips it away to the backward square leg fence. 74 more needed now
make it 70 - short and wide outside the off stump, Chigumbura winds up and cuts it away through backward point for yet another boundary
short and wide outside the off stump, pitched very short
driven down to mid-on, no room for a single there
good length delivery outside the off stump and that's hammered away through cover point, there is protection in the deep
line and length delivery outside the off stump, Matsikenyeri looks to work it away fine and the ball zips past the outside edge. Good delivery to end a terrible over
flat delivery outside the off stump, driven back to the bowler
pushed back down the track
goes low and sweeps it down to fine leg for a single
flat and fuller in length, driven straight to the fielder at mid-on
punched away off the back-foot to the mid-off region and they scamper through for a single. Direct hit would have been close
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Matsikenyeri gets a good stride in and drives it through covers. Lovely shot
driven down to long-off, gets it wide of the fielder in the deep and they scamper through for the second
defended down on the leg side
fuller in length, driven towards extra cover
defended awkwardly and the ball rolls away on the off side
gets forward and tries to loft it away on the leg side, end up with a thick top edge and the ball balloons up over the fielder at mid-off, lucky escape
quicker delivery to end the over - defended watchfully
punched off the back-foot to silly mid-off
arm ball, defended off the front-foot
driven away to sweeper cover for a single
leans forward to defend back to the bowler
on the middle, squeezed off the inner edge to the on side
turns away from the off stump line, defended to the off side
slightly short in length outside off, punched away to covers .. throw has a shy at the non-strikers' end, misses and it runs away to the boundary! oh dear!
leans forward to deflect it towards midwicket
lovely delivery, slower in the air, drifted towards off stump, draws the batsman forward before turning away past the outside edge
places this wide of cover for a single.
on the middle and off, flighted full, pushed back to the bowler
turns away from the off stump, short in length ,cut to backward point where there is a slight fumble and the batsmen rush across
on the middle and off, pushed back down the track
leans forward to work this to midwicket
poor delivery, short and he latches on to it in style. He went back and pulled it over wide mid-on region. Crash.
What a fine knock this has been from Chigumbura. It was fuller, around the off stump and Chigumbura goes for the sweep and connects superbly ... Walloped it to midwicket boundary.
flighted on the leg stump line, flicked down to fine-leg
shuffles across to clip the delivery from middle to behind square-leg
bad delivery. Very short and it has been pulled away in style to the boundary. Chigumbura is having a great game tonight.
on the legs, shoveled away to short fine-leg fielder
comes in with the arm, squeezed off bat and pad to the on side
flighted full, runs off the inner half of the bat towards mid-on
stays back to punch it right of short cover where its deflected towards mid-off
flighted outside off, full, driven to deep cover
bowling some off breaks here, pushed back to the bowler
on the middle and leg stump line, driven to long-on

Almost run out He charged out and hit it towards the non-striker and ran with the shot. The ball deflected off Chugumbura's bat to the off side. Matsikenyeri rushes back to beat the throw from the short cover fielder
turns in, pushed to right of midwicket .. direct hit at the non-striker's end and the ball runs away for a extra run
goes right back to tap it towards backward point for a quick single
on the off stump, arm ball. punched to the off side
on the middle, slower through the air, defended on the front foot
just outside off, guided to backward point for a quick single
slows up the pace, outside off, driven to covers
outside off stump, full, driven to long-off
on the off and middle, pushed away to point
length delivery around the off stump line, pushed to mid-off and they take a easy run! The fielding has been pretty poor actually ...
goes for the yorker, falls short of the block hole, around 131 kmph, Matsikenyeri drives it straight past the bowler
short delivery outside off, goes for the upper cut but doesn't connect.
Wallop. Chigumbura is having a blast out there. Full pitched just outside off and he thrashed it wide of mid-off for yet another boundary
on the leg stump line, again tapped towards mid-on and they take the run
length delivery in the zone outside off stump, tries to dab it to third man but is beaten
flighted on the off stump line, eased down to long-off
on the middle, worked wide of mid-on
What a stylish way to reach the fifty. It was short in length and Chigumbura, the star today, pulled it high over midwicket boundary. 12th ODI fifty.
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
tosses this up and pushed down to long-off without any fuss
stays back to a length delivery and squeezes it wide of backward point for a single
loopy delivery around off and middle, gets the edge but goes wide of slip
shorter in length, quicker one, skids on straight, pulled to left of mid-on
goes right back to defend to the on side

Crash. Bang. Short and wide, slapped away hard to the cover boundary. Zimbabwe win by 5 wickets. The Bangladesh players shake hands with the batsmen. What a wonderful partnership between the two to take Zim home with 15 overs to spare.
